eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 05:29 PM ON OCT 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:30 AM OCT 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Surprise Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Surprise Police Department is looking for a Hispanic male, Abel Perez, 41 years-old, 5 foot 7 inches, 120 lbs, brown hair with brown eyes. Abel was last seen wearing a blue shirt and blue jeans and was last seen on foot in the area of Prasada near Waddell Road and Loop 303, in Surprise, Arizona, Maricopa County today. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
